title: Quinoa with griddled aubergines
ingredients: ['300 g (10½ oz) quinoa', '3–4 sprigs of fresh thyme', '1.2 litres (2 pints) vegetable stock, preferably home-made', '250 g (8½ oz) baby aubergines, cut lengthways into quarters', '1 red pepper, seeded and cut into chunks', '1 red onion, cut into chunks', '2 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '200 g (7 oz) cherry tomatoes', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '300 ml (10 fl oz) tomato juice', "150 g (5½ oz) goat's cheese log with herbs, cut into 8 slices", 'salt and pepper']
